body_html:
It's easy to test with latest version, no recompilation needed. IE, get the whl link from tensorflow github front page, then

conda create --name sep13 --clone my_previous_env
source activate sep13
pip install --upgrade https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-matrix-linux-gpu/TF_BUILD_IS_OPT=OPT,TF_BUILD_IS_PIP=PIP,TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION=PYTHON3.5,label=gpu-linux/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/pip_test/whl/tensorflow_gpu-1.3.0-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl
python run_my_script.py

conda create --name sep13 --clone my_previous_env
source activate sep13

body:
It's easy to test with latest version, no recompilation needed. IE, get the whl link from tensorflow github  front page, then

```
conda create --name sep13 --clone my_previous_env
source activate sep13
pip install --upgrade https://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-matrix-linux-gpu/TF_BUILD_IS_OPT=OPT,TF_BUILD_IS_PIP=PIP,TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION=PYTHON3.5,label=gpu-linux/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/pip_test/whl/tensorflow_gpu-1.3.0-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl
python run_my_script.py
```
